WorkItem.Description: The prismatic gem Enchanted Tear is treating the meta requirement in one Enchanted Tear Gem. I'm attaching my kitty gear. In it I have the Relentless Earthsiege Diamond. This requires 1 red gem, 1 blue gem, and 1 yellow gem. I recently read to use the Enchanted Tear for any blue sockets. So I turned on Enchanted Tear in the enchanted > Tier options. After running the optimizer it told me to change out the blue and yellow gems in my chest to 1 agility and put the Enchanted Tear into my Sinners Binding. That was the ONLY Tear it told me to put the gem in.
WorkItem.Summary: Enchanted Tear treating all meta requirements in one gem

Comments.Message: This is correct, that's how it works. 1 Tear (and only 1 tear, they're unique-equipped) satisfies the Relentless meta requirement.
Interesting. I was under the impression that it satisfied only one of the colors. I didn't realize it satisfied one of every color. Cool

Rawr also thinks 1 Tear satisifes the requirements for Chaotic Skyflare Diamond (at least 2 blue gems), but it doesn't.

http://www.wowhead.com/?item=41285

Should I make a new issue item for this?
